allow:
Bash(TERM_PROGRAM="Cursor" zsh -c 'detect_zsh_mode() {
    # VSCode and VSCode-based IDEs
    if [[ -n ""$VSCODE_PID"" || ""$TERM_PROGRAM"" == ""vscode"" || -n ""$VSCODE_INJECTION"" ]]; then
        echo ""staggered""
        return 0
    fi
    
    # Cursor IDE (VSCode-based)
    if [[ ""$TERM_PROGRAM"" == ""Cursor"" || -n ""$CURSOR_IDE"" ]]; then
        echo ""staggered""
        return 0
    fi
    
    echo ""heavy""
}

echo ""Cursor detection result: $(detect_zsh_mode)""')
